txt.en:
'Oh, wonderful! Those flowers look beautiful and will be perfect for my gift!'

You hand her the lavender and white flowers as she is dancing with excitement.

'Now I can finish this crown and I just know my sister will love it. Mum says she has been sick for a long while and must rest. Mum is worried she is not getting better, but I am certain this will make her better soon!'

'Thank you!'
Gella asked you to gather lavender anemones near the pond and white anemones near the keep in Lond Cirion.

'Hooray! These flowers are so pretty!'

You hand her the lavender and white flowers as her eyes light up with joy.

'Now I can finish my special crown, and I know Amardis will love it! Mum says she has been unwell and must rest. Mum fears her health does not improve, but with this crown, I am certain she'll be on her feet in no time!

'Thank you!'
Gella has asked you to gather some white and purple flowers for a crown she is making.

'Hello! I'm Gella! You look like someone who is good at helping. I am making a gift for my sister, Amardis, but I could use some help gathering the last of what I need for it.

'There are the prettiest lavender flowers around the pond just behind me... but mum is afraid I will fall in if I get too near! Oh, and the white ones near the keep up the road would be lovely too, they are her favourite!

'I'll be so grateful!'
Bring the flowers to TBD Girl by the pond in Lond Cirion
Collect lavender anemones near the pond ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect white anemones near the keep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the flowers to Gella by the pond in Lond Cirion
